content: welcome to krissy s over the mountain crochet the peekaboo ridge chemo cap is lovely and is perfect for male or female 1 easy to read crochet pattern 2 3 sizes included 3 easy to find yarn lion brand coboo 4 so soft and comfortable for a chemo patient this crochet pattern is being featured in sweet potato 3 s crochet cancer challenge in the month of october go to the website below to participate in this exciting challenge https //sweetpotato3 com/2022-crochet-cancer-challenge/ 1 the peekaboo ridge chemo cap uses lion brand coboo yarn this yarn makes a perfect chemo cap it is soft and tender to the skin the peekaboo ridge adds just a little bit of air flow you will love making this chemo cap for a lady or man the easy texture is fun to crochet and fashionable to wear i was diagnosed with breast cancer in october of 2021 i always thought that i would be devastated if i was told i had cancer but god gave me total peace i had a mastectomy the following november i have grown emotionally since going through surgery and endocrine treatments i am thankful for the emotional and spiritual growth and i would never want to go back copyright statement this pattern is protected by copyright© krissys over the mountain crochet 2022 do not sell alter or redistribute this information in any way or form you have my permission to sell your finished product but you are responsible for the finished product no mass production 1 https //sweetpotato3 com/2022-crochet-cancer-challenge/
